price: Este Libro es una revelación que proviene de Dios, el Poderoso, el Sabio.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
